name: 2048,HD version
description:
Colorful theme,decorate the surface more beautiful.
just double tap to exchange the colorful themes rapidly.

Join the numbers and get to tehe 2048 tile!
start from 2,4,8 not only 2
Swipe to move all tiles,When two tiles with the same number touch,they merge into one.

Get to the 2048 tile, and reach a high score!
